Let me know if you have any of these cards, along with an asking price or cards you need for potential trade.  If you can, send scans in your PM to me.  

Emil Batch - PSA 5 or 6

Chief Bender portrait - PSA 4 or 5

Hal Chase - Blue Background - PSA 5

Red Dooin - PSA 5 or 6

Johnny Evers - Bat - Chicago on Shirt - PSA 4

Izzy Hoffman - PSA 5 or 6

Hughie Jennings - Portrait - PSA 4 or 5

Hunky Shaw - PSA 5 or 6

Thanks!
